articles.author: Connie Loizos
articles.title: How iRobot lost its way home - TechCrunch
articles.description: iRobot survived three decades of competition, but couldn't survive European regulators killing its Amazon buyout. Now it's being taken over by its own supplier in bankruptcy court.
articles.content: There’s something painfully American about the arc of iRobot, the company that taught your vacuum to navigate around the furniture. Founded in 1990 in Bedford, Massachusetts by MIT roboticist Rodney … [+4793 chars]
